language.language: >>> ðŸ”¡ | The language for this server is **English**, you can change it using the [dashboard](<https://stereo-bot.tk/dashboard> 'Stereo - Dashboard') or using the `/language` command

announce.description: Changes the way Stereo announces new songs

args.enabled: If announcing should be enabled or not
args.delete: If old announcements should be deleted or not

announce.success: >>> {emoji.greentick} | Song announcements are now **{announce}**, deleting old announcements are now **{deleteAnnounce}**!

defaultvol.description: Changes the default volume for this server

args.value: The value the default volume has to change to

defaultvol.fail: >>> {emoji.redcross} | The provided value must be between 1 and 200!

autorepeat.description: Enables or disables queue repeat when a player is created

autoshuffle.description: Enables or disables automatic shuffle when a player is created

defaultbass.description: Changes the default bassboost level for this server

args.level: The level the default bassboost has to change to

defaultbass.success: >>> {emoji.greentick} | The default bassboost level changed to **{defaultbassboost}**!
